name: c3bottles
description: Bottle drop and collection management system for chaos events

scripts.build:deps: mkdir -p static/lib/js/ static/lib/css/ && browserify assets/js/**.js | uglifyjs -m > static/lib/js/lib.js && cp -r node_modules/bootstrap/dist/fonts/ static/lib/ && cp node_modules/bootstrap/dist/css/* static/lib/css/
scripts.build:tiles: convert static/img/map.png -background white -compose Copy -gravity center -resize 16384x16384 -extent 16384x16384 static/img/map_sq.png && gdal_translate -of vrt static/img/map_sq.png static/img/map_sq.vrt && gdal2tiles.py -w none -p raster static/img/map_sq.vrt static/img/tiles/

author: MichiK <michik@michik.net>
